甐字的基本解释

甐
lìn
因磨损而变薄：“侔以行山，则是搏以行石也，是故轮虽敝，不甐于凿。”
器物。
器物坚固。

甐字的汉语字典释义

[①]［lìn］
［《廣韻》良刃切，去震，來。］
敝，损坏。

甐字的康熙字典解释

【午集上】【瓦字部】　甐； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页752第07
【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?良刃切，音吝。【玉篇】器也。　又【正韻】動也，蔽也。【周禮·冬官考工記】是故輪雖敝，不甐於鑿。【註】不甐於鑿，謂不動於鑿中也。鄭云：甐亦敝也。以輪厚石，雖齧之不能敝，其鑿旁使之動。　又【韻會】【正韻】?離珍切，音鄰。義同。

甐字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
甐字的起名意思

暂无。

Ren
Basic explanation of words
Ren
lìn
Thinning due to wear and tear: "If you walk the mountain, you are struggling to walk the stone. Therefore, although the wheel is awkward, it is indifferent to chiseling."
Utensils.
The utensils are sturdy.
Ren
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［lìn］
["Guang Yun" cuts with a good blade, go to shake, come. ]
My, damaged.
Ren
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【Wu Ji 1】【Wa Word Department】　甐; Kangxi Strokes: 17; Page Number: Page 752 No. 07
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Zheng Yun]? Good blade cut, mean sound. [Jade articles] Tools also.　 [Zheng Yun] Move, and hide. [Zhou Li·Dongguan Kao Gong Ji] It is the reason why the wheel is not indifferent, but it is not indifferent. [Note] If you are not indifferent to chiseling, it means that you are not moving in chiseling. Zheng Yun: It's not too bad. The stone is thick with the wheel, although it can't be gnawed, the chisel moves it.　[Yunhui] [Zhengyun]? Li Zhenqie, sound neighbor. The same meaning.
Ren

Name meaning
Nothing.
lìn, lín
гл. стачивать; скашивать, портить; с точенный, испорченный
